title: INTRODUCING Killers Amongst Us with Nancy Grace
itunes:title: INTRODUCING Killers Amongst Us with Nancy Grace
description:
From iHeartMedia and Crime Online, 'Killers Amongst Us with Nancy Grace' is a brand new weekly podcast premiering Tuesday, March 17th in our 'Crime Stories with Nancy Grace' podcast feed! Nancy Grace investigates the most notorious murders and ongoing unsolved cases in the search for justice. 'Killers Amongst Us' is an all-new concept, utilizing cutting edge forensic analysis, techniques, and modern-day detective work to investigate the most notorious murders and ongoing unsolved cases in the search for justice. Episodes will feature guests including the victim’s family members, case investigators and local reporters who provide their own unique insights to go behind the crimes. A new mystery every month! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
